message.entry: First argument must be a matrix of type double or single, or a function handle.
When first argument is a matrix, it must be square.
Second argument must be a real vector of type double or single.
Number of columns in the matrix must be the same as the length of the column vector.
The output of the function handle must be double or single.
The output of the call to the function handle A with the 'notransp' flag must be the same size as the vector argument to that call."
Third argument must be a real double vector or a single real vector.
